item.title: Release Roundup April 17, 2024
item.description: Percona software releases and updates April 2 - April 17, 2024. Percona is a leading provider of unbiased, performance-first, open source database solutions that allow organizations to easily, securely, and affordably maintain business agility, minimize risks, and stay competitive, free from vendor lock-in. Percona software is designed for peak performance, uncompromised security, limitless scalability, and disaster-proofed availability. Our Release Roundups showcase the latest Percona software updates, tools, and features to help you manage and deploy our software.
